title: [Path to Enlightenment]
description: Brilliant light dances upon everything here, and yet the light does not wash out the colors, but rather enhances them in a magical way.  Every plant and flower seems to be a bit larger and a bit healthier than anything you've ever seen.  Indeed, the longer you stay here, the better you feel.

Brilliant torchlight dances upon everything here, and yet the light does not wash out the colors, but rather enhances them in a magical way.  Every plant and flower seems to be a bit larger and a bit healthier than anything you've ever seen.  Indeed, the longer you stay here, the better you feel.
